name: Sabjorn

aspects.trouble: Desperate to Save My Family's Legacy
other_aspects: Honest Nord Trying to Play by the Rules

stunts: Master Brewer: +2 to Crafts when creating or evaluating mead quality
Merchant's Instinct: +2 to Notice when detecting fraud or sabotage in business dealings
Family Reputation: +2 to Rapport when dealing with traditional Nords who respect old families
notes: Sabjorn is the owner of Honningbrew Meadery, a struggling business that's been systematically sabotaged by Maven Black-Briar's agent Mallus Maccius. He's an honest, hardworking Nord trying to maintain his family's brewing legacy, but he's desperate and increasingly willing to bend the rules to save the meadery. He doesn't know that Mallus is the source of his problems - he thinks skeever infestations and quality issues are just bad luck. Maven's goal is to drive him to ruin so she can buy the meadery cheap and eliminate competition for Black-Briar Mead. Sabjorn is proud and stubborn, which makes him vulnerable to manipulation.
combat_tactics: Sabjorn is not a fighter. If threatened, he'll try to talk his way out or flee. He might grab a brewing tool as an improvised weapon but would rather call for guards.
social_interaction: Sabjorn is initially proud but becomes increasingly desperate and anxious. He's friendly to potential customers and allies, but stress makes him short-tempered. He speaks with Nordic directness and takes pride in his family's brewing traditions. He'll eagerly accept help but is slow to trust when it comes to business rivals. His desperation makes him vulnerable to exploitation.

relationships.Maven Black-Briar: Business rival, doesn't know she's orchestrating his downfall
relationships.Whiterun Guards: Cooperative, seeks their help with pest problems
relationships.Commander Caius: Seeks contracts for guard mead supply

personality_notes.speaking_style: Nordic, proud, increasingly desperate, traditional values
quirks: Blames bad luck rather than sabotage
personality_notes.character_growth: If the pest problem is solved, he may discover Mallus's treachery and become more suspicious and cautious in business

story_hooks: Central NPC in Dampened Spirits quest
May hire PC to investigate pest problems in meadery
Unwitting victim of Maven Black-Briar's schemes
Potential ally if saved from sabotage
May become informant against Maven if properly motivated

dialogue_samples.greeting: Welcome to Honningbrew Meadery! The finest mead in Skyrim - or it will be once I sort out these cursed pest problems.
dialogue_samples.desperate: I don't understand it. The quality drops, the pests multiply... it's as if someone's cursing this place.
dialogue_samples.proud: My family's been brewing mead for three generations. I won't let that legacy die, no matter what it takes.
dialogue_samples.seeking_help: I'm willing to pay good coin for someone who can solve this pest problem. The guard contract depends on it.
dialogue_samples.after_discovery: Mallus? But he's been with me for years! How could he... Maven Black-Briar. Of course. That viper.

dampened_spirits_context.problem: Skeever infestation and mead poisoning orchestrated by Mallus Maccius
dampened_spirits_context.stakes: Guard mead contract and meadery survival
dampened_spirits_context.vulnerability: Desperate enough to accept suspicious help
resolution_paths: PC helps clear pests and exposes Mallus
PC extorts Sabjorn for personal gain
